pageContext.title: Redeeming EcoPoints
pageContext.content:
Once you have accumulated enough EcoPoints to earn a reward, go to the EcoCart extension > Account tab > EcoPoints tab.

Then, select your reward, click redeem, and an email will be sent to you with information about the project you’re contributing to or your e-gift card. You’ll only be able to redeem rewards you have enough EcoPoints for.
